node.description: A beast is the size of the largest common dog. It has a greenish coat with brown spots. Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost undetectable as it moves.
node.long_descr: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.

node.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and agile. You see hatred in his eyes, and you try to avoid his stare. His tense body looks ready to spring upon you, like a mountain lion stalking its prey. He sees you noticing him, and quietly disappears.
node.long_descr: A valley elf wanders here, cautious of your intrusion.

node.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. She glares at you, then quickly disappears before you see more of her.
node.long_descr: A female valley elf wanders here, skirting between the tall grasses.

node.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. He glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.
node.long_descr: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!

node.description: This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile. She glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.
node.long_descr: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!

node.description: The elf notices your intrusion and attacks with determination.
node.long_descr: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, searching for intruders like you!

node.description: She is currently doing some menial chores, and ignores your intrusion except when you are in her way.
node.long_descr: A valley elf is here, doing her duties.

node.description: This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age. He looks quite potent, though.
node.long_descr: A valley elf elder is here, studying. He notices you. A valley elf elder shouts 'You have intruded wrongly. Be prepared to die!'

node.description: This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age. She looks quite potent, though.
node.long_descr: A valley elf elder is here, studying. She notices you. A valley elf elder says 'Your arrogance will be your end, human.'

node.description: This big beast looks like a small red dragon, but has many more heads than a regular dragon, too. It doesn't look happy.
node.long_descr: A big beast with many heads, each breathing fire, stares at you with malice.

node.description: He looks old and feeble.
node.long_descr: An old hermit sits here, smoking a pipe.

node.description: Talemon looks harmless, but the fireballs he throws at you don't.
node.long_descr: An old mage busies himself with some chemicals.

node.description: This daemon is unhappy with its summoned job, and is willing to take out it's anger at you!
node.long_descr: A huge guardian daemon is here, watching the treasure.

node.description: The wolf is covered with brown hair. It looks at you with fright.
node.long_descr: A wolf is here, looking for small prey.

node.description: With horns and spots over coarse, brown hair, this beast is the spit and image of ... an antelope.
node.long_descr: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.

node.description: A shiny metallic shirt is on the floor.
node.name: chainmail elven chain mail

node.description: Some soft boots are on the floor.
node.name: boots elven

node.description: A shiny blade is on the floor.
node.name: longsword elven sword long

node.description: A pile of brown cloth is on the floor.
node.name: cloak brown

node.description: A shiny key is on the floor.
node.name: key

node.description: A shiny key is on the floor.
node.name: key

node.description: Яркое золотое кольцо (ring) испускает маленькую струйку дыма на полу.
node.name: ring gold talemon золотое кольцо талемона

node.description: A quarterstaff is on the floor.
node.name: quarterstaff staff two-handed

node.description: A potion is on the floor.

node.description: You are on a path away from the Plains of Ofcol. The path doesn't look well tread, but it is relatively well kept. To the south are the Plains of Ofcol, while this path leads north.

node.name: north
node.description: The path continues north.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the Plains of Ofcol.

node.name: A Path from the Plains

node.description: You are on the path away from the Plains of Ofcol. The main path leads north to an overlook and south back toward the Plains of Ofcol. Western and eastern side paths can be seen, probably deer trails by the width of them.

node.name: east
node.description: You see the small trail.

node.name: north
node.description: You see the overlook.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the path back toward Ofcol.

node.name: west
node.description: You see the small trail.

node.name: Along the Path

node.description: This small deer trail leads north and east.

node.name: east
node.description: The main path is to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: The trail continues north.

node.name: A Small Trail

node.description: This small deer trail leads north and west.

node.name: north
node.description: The trail continues north.

node.name: west
node.description: The main path is to the west.

node.name: A Small Trail

node.description: You are above a large valley. Below you, you see humanoid forms wandering around the valley. Rich green grass covers the valley, with some small trees dotting the landscape. To the south is the trail back toward Ofcol.

node.name: down
node.description: You see the entrance to the valley.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the path back toward Ofcol.

node.name: The Overlook

node.description: You are at the entrance to the Valley of the Elves. Elves stare at your intrusion, but most are too busy to bother with you. The valley spreads to the north, while enlarging toward the east and west.

node.name: east
node.description: The valley continues east.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues north.

node.name: up
node.description: The overlook is above you.

node.name: west
node.description: The valley continues west.

node.name: The Entrance to the Valley of the Elves

node.description: You are at the edge of the Valley of the Elves. High above you, you see a small trail circling the entire valley. The valley continues north and east.

node.name: east
node.description: The entrance to the valley is to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues north.

node.name: The Edge of the Valley

node.name: The Edge of the Valley

node.description: You are on a narrow trail leading away from the Valley of the Elves. This trail leads north and south. A rope ladder leads up to a rope bridge.

node.name: north
node.description: The trail continues north.

node.name: south
node.description: The trail leads back to the valley.

node.name: up
node.description: You see the rope bridge above you.

node.name: A Trail Leading from the Valley

node.description: You are on the trail away from the Valley of the Elves. The hills around you keep this trail narrow. The trail continues east, south, west and north. You see the the field beyond the north trail.

node.name: east
node.description: The trail continues east.

node.name: north
node.description: The Path of Arcadia.

node.name: south
node.description: The trail continues south back toward the valley.

node.name: west
node.description: The trail continues west.

node.name: Along the Trail

node.description: You are on the trail away from the Valley of the Elves. The hills around you keep this trail narrow. The trail continues north and back west.

node.name: north
node.description: You see a small valley north.

node.name: west
node.description: The trail goes back to the west.

node.name: A Bend in the Trail

node.description: You are in another valley within these hills. To the north, you can see a building, and to the south you see the trail away from this valley. The west and east paths surround this building.

node.name: east
node.description: You see the trail around the building.

node.name: north
node.description: You see the building.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the trail leading away from this valley.

node.name: west
node.description: You see the trail around the building.

node.name: A Smaller Valley

node.name: east
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: north
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: A Trail in the Valley

node.name: east

node.name: A Trail in the Valley

node.description: You are in the home of the valley elves. The building continues to the north and the east, and the exit is to the south.

node.name: east
node.description: The building continues to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: The building continues to the north.

node.name: south
node.description: The exit is to the south.

node.name: The Elf Home

node.description: You are in a community kitchen for this valley elven home. Pots and pans line the walls, along with shelves filled with many foodstuffs. A big oven is to one side, and you can smell elfcakes being baked. There is a doorway to the north and one to the west.

node.name: north
node.description: The building continues to the north.

node.name: west
node.description: The building continues to the west.

node.name: The Kitchen

node.name: north
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: north
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: south
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: A Trail in the Valley

node.description: You are in the living room of the elven home. Mats cover the floor, and a on a table is a bowl full of fruits. Through the window you can see the valley, with its wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

node.name: east
node.description: The building continues to the east.

node.name: south
node.description: The entrance is to the south.

node.name: The Living Room

node.description: You are in the storage room of the elven home. Sacks of flour cover one side, and cleaning accessories cover the other side. You find nothing of use here. A staircase leads up.

node.name: south
node.description: The building continues to the south.

node.name: up
node.description: You see the second floor.

node.name: west
node.description: The building continues to the west.

node.description: You are in the room of the valley elf elders. Books written in strange languages line the numerous shelves, and scrolls cover a table. There is a smooth spheric object in the center of the room.

node.name: east
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: north
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: The Elders' Room

node.description: You are in a storage room. Many useless (to you) items fill this room.

node.name: north
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: west
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: The Storage Room

node.description: You are in the sleeping quarters of the valley elves. Cots line the floor, with two windows showing a view of the valley. Books in strange languages line the shelves, but nothing of interest is here.

node.name: east
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: south
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: The Sleeping Quarters

node.description: You are in the study room of the valley elves. Comfortable mats are on the floor, and musical instruments are neatly stacked on shelves. Books in strange languages line some other elves. A stairway leads down to the first floor.

node.name: down
node.description: You see the first floor.

node.name: south
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: west
node.description: You see another room.

node.name: Study

node.description: You are on a narrow trail on the rim of the Valley of the Elves. Below you, you can see the valley, filled with wild flowers and tall, green grasses.

node.name: down
node.description: The trail down doesn't look safe to travel on at all.

node.name: Along a Windy Trail on the Rim of the Valley

node.description: You are on the rope bridge. From here, you can see the whole Valley of the Elves. To the south, you see the main valley. To the north-east, you see a smaller valley with a building in the center of it. To the north-west, you can see a very small valley with a shack in it's center. A rope ladder leads down into a trail.

node.name: down
node.description: You see the trail.

node.name: On the Rope Bridge

node.description: You are on a bend in the trail leading from the main valley. The hills around you make this trail quite narrow.

node.name: east
node.description: The trail continues east.

node.name: north
node.description: The trail continues north.

node.name: A Bend in the Trail

node.description: You are on a bend in the trail leading from the main valley. The hills around you make this trail quite narrow. To the west, you can see an even smaller valley, with looks like a small shack in the center of it.

node.name: south
node.description: The trail continues south.

node.name: west
node.description: The entrance to the small valley is to the west.

node.name: A Bend in the Trail

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. The exit from this valley is to the east, and the entrance to the shack is to the west.

node.name: east
node.description: The exit from this small valley is to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues to the north.

node.name: south
node.description: The valley continues to the south.

node.name: west
node.description: You see the small shack.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south-west is a small shack.

node.name: south
node.description: The valley continues to the south.

node.name: west
node.description: The valley continues to the west.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north-west is a small shack.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues to the north.

node.name: west
node.description: The valley continues to the west.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south is a small shack.

node.name: east
node.description: The valley continues to the east.

node.name: west
node.description: The valley continues to the west.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the south-east is a small shack. To the north is the oak doors of an high tower.

node.name: east
node.description: The valley continues to the east.

node.name: south
node.description: The valley continues to the south.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the east is a small shack.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues to the north.

node.name: south
node.description: The valley continues to the south.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north-east is a small shack.

node.name: east
node.description: The valley continues to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: The valley continues to the north.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are in the small valley. Strangely, tall trees grow here, almost as if some magic was used to help them grow. To the north is a small shack.

node.name: east
node.description: The valley continues to the east.

node.name: west
node.description: The valley continues to the west.

node.name: The Small Valley

node.description: You are inside the small shack. A small stove is on the side, with soup cooking over it. You see nothing valuable.

node.name: down
node.description: You see a trap door!

node.name: east
node.description: You see the valley outside.

node.name: Inside the Small Shack

node.description: You are beneath the small shack, in a tunnel that leads south. It feels quite warm down here.

node.name: south
node.description: The room looks reddish down there.

node.name: up
node.description: Back to known territory!

node.name: Beneath the Small Shack

node.description: You are in the den of the pyrohydra. All the walls are charred, and this room is filled with a smell close to that of burning tar.

node.name: east
node.description: You see breaks in the charred rock to the east.

node.name: north
node.description: You see the relative safety to the north.

node.name: west
node.description: You see a door to the west.

node.name: The Den of the Pyrohydra

node.description: This room looks like it is used for magical studies. Potions bubble over burners, and the whole room spells of herbs and dead animal flesh. A furnace to the side casts a bright light in this room. The whole room radiates with a magical aura.
node.name: The Workroom

node.description: This room is used to store scrolls, potions, and other magical items. The whole room radiates with a magical aura.
node.name: The Storage Room

node.description:
You have fallen trying to go down this steep hill. Maybe that wasn't that good an idea, huh?
You've fallen, and you can't get up!
node.name: WAY Far Down into the Valley
